RimGamble.TravelingGamblerAcceptanceDef.label: leaves
RimGamble.TravelingGamblerAcceptanceDef.letterDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} thanks you for your hospitality, but says that it is time for {PAWN_objective} to move on.

RimGamble.TravelingGamblerAcceptanceDef.label: human bomb
RimGamble.TravelingGamblerAcceptanceDef.letterDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} whispered something about cleansing the impure. {PAWN_pronoun} burst apart in a flash.

RimGamble.TravelingGamblerAcceptanceDef.label: sabotage
RimGamble.TravelingGamblerAcceptanceDef.letterDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} is now leaving, but they seem to be acting strangely before leaving...

RimGamble.TravelingGamblerAcceptanceDef.label: life of the party
RimGamble.TravelingGamblerAcceptanceDef.letterDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} is now leaving, and the colony feels a little quieter without them. Their charm and energy brought joy to many, and their absence is already felt.

RimGamble.TravelingGamblerAcceptanceDef.label: rumor spread
RimGamble.TravelingGamblerAcceptanceDef.letterDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} has departed, but something feels off. The rumors they seeded continue to stir tension, and the air is thick with unspoken doubts.

RimGamble.TravelingGamblerAcceptanceDef.label: theft accept
RimGamble.TravelingGamblerAcceptanceDef.letterDesc: After staying with you {PAWN_nameDef} seems to have taken advantage of your kindness - it seems some silver has gone missing!
RimGamble.TravelingGamblerAcceptanceDef.alternativeLetterDesc: After staying with you {PAWN_nameDef} seems to have taken advantage of your kindness - they wanted to steal from you but instead left upset as they could not find any silver to steal.

RimGamble.TravelingGamblerAcceptanceDef.label: trade caravan
RimGamble.TravelingGamblerAcceptanceDef.letterDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} is leaving, they have put in a good word with a trade caravan, they should be arriving soon.
